title: Crossing Hope
description: The bad boy and the rebel daughter.Forbidden fruit never tasted so sweet... Her brothers' worst enemy.The cocky country boy who lovesto drive her insane.And now she has to work with himrather than take a one-way tripout of this two-bit town? It's Marley's worst nightmare.And now she has to live it.Stuck side by side with the town's mostsnarly, surly, inked-up,bad boy. Greyson's got a rough, tough reputationand an attitude to match.Working with the sharp-tongued sisterof his biggest rivalsis the last thing he wants. Until he starts wanting her. Marley's off-limits.Not for him.But the more time they spend together,the less Greyson can resistthe attraction burning between them like wildfire. Marley never meant to stayGreyson never meant to fall for her.Will their forbidden passion burn them both?Or will this bad boyTurn out to be a good man?  From USA Today best-selling author Kimberly Kincaid comes a scorching hot romance featuring a rough and tumble country-boy hero and the fiery, fierce woman who surprises them both by stealing his heart. Full-length steamy happily ever after worthy of a great, big "yes, ma'am!"
author: Kimberly Kincaid
